contentrichtext.text: {{wiktionary|Lemuria}} {{TOCright}} '''Lemuria''' may refer to: * [[Lemuria (festival)]], in Roman religion, a feast during which the unwholesome and malevolent spectres of the restless dead (lemures) were propitiated * [[Lemuria (continent)]], name given to a hypothetical land mass in the Indian Ocean == Fiction == * [[Lemuria in popular culture]], also known as Kumari Kandam * [[Lemuria (comics)]], two locations in the Marvel Universe * ''Lemuria'', a mysterious hidden island in the video game series [[Golden Sun]] * [[D20 Modern#Lemuria|Lemuria (role-playing)]], a 2004 RPG world designed for the d20 Modern game by Swedes Anders Blixt and Krister Sundelin * [[Lemuria (Transformers)|''Lemuria'' (Transformers)]], one of four missing spaceships in the animated television series ''Transformers: Cybertron'' * Lemuria, a character in the reality TV series ''[[Who Wants to Be a Superhero?]]'' == Music == * [[Lemurian (album)|''Lemurian'' (album)]], the second full-length album by Nottingham-based artist Lone, released on August 4, 2008 * ''[[A Black Moon Broods over Lemuria]]'', a 1995 album by Bal-Sagoth, a British symphonic black metal band * [[Lemuria (album)|''Lemuria'' (album)]], an album released by the Swedish symphonic metal band Therion in 2004, also featuring a song by the same name * [[Lemuria (band)]], an indie/punk band from Buffalo, New York, USA * "Lemuria", a song by Austrian symphonic metal band [[Visions of Atlantis]], from their 2004 album ''Cast Away'' * ''Lemuria'', a song by [[Kenny Barron]] from the album ''Autumn In New York'' * ''Lemuria Rising'', a song by [[The Murder City Devils]] * [[Lemuria (Belgian band)]], a Belgian black folk metal band. {{disambig}}
